attributes.action: Add a "resend verification" link to the "Now check your email!" page.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sometimes a verification e-mail for a signature to a petition on this site goes AWOL without reason. It's not trapped by filters, nor by the ISP (verified on my own domain which has direct to mail server MX records). Rather than signing again, an option to resend the verification e-mail on the "Now check your email!" page would allow the verification e-mail to be sent again.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
